```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(plotly)
```

```{r message=FALSE}
dados = read_csv(here("../dados/speed-dating.csv"))
```

```{r}
dados %>% 
    filter(!is.na(fun)) %>%
    filter(!is.na(like)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = fun, y = like, color = like)) + 
    geom_count()
```
